text: I'm Matthias, Frontend Developer looking for professional challanges, and this is my portfolio.
If you want to see more swipe right.

I'm a Front-End developer, living in from Stockholm. I'm passionate about making better www's, one website at a time. My guiding principles are aesthetics, functionality and user-friendliness. And I have “Keep it simple, stupid” tattooed on my left leg…. Not.
My long term goal is that I at some point of my  career will be part of a project that “makes a difference ... makes the world a little better
And…my short-term goal is to get developing and interesting work assignments.

After studying, practicing and doing some development work in frontend, I have come a long way in learning about web development. I have good knowledge of the basics and have immersed myself in frameworks, mainly React.

view.header: Links to some fun projects that I have done in my spare time.
text: Car Bingo game - made with react and strapi tho i wanted to learn headless
Got an exercise from my supervisor/school. The assignment was that I would build in a week a platform for a floorball tournament with react and .net
